Homo sapiens lived we stopped being
nomadic and started setting up permanent

many experts believe our flu problems

gathering and started farming and
domesticating animals until then
influenza was only an animal disease it
infected birds horses wild boar and our
contact with these animals was rare
but when we started to raise animals
domestically we brought them into direct
daily physical contact with other

few viruses began to jump between
